name: Astrian Flock
description:
Fend off the relentless alien swarms in deep space in this shoot em up made with Pocket Code. Tap screen to start. Tap screen to shoot. Tilt to move left right.

Available as Android apk.

Also available as Pocket Code programs in 2 versions.

  • On-screen buttons. Available at https://pocketcode.org/details/1574
  • Tilt to move. Available at https://pocketcode.org/details/1568
